articles.author: Chiara Giordano
articles.title: Prince Harry wins bid to challenge Home Office ban on him paying for UK security - The Independent
articles.description: Duke of Sussex taking legal action over decision not to allow him to pay for police protection for himself and family when visiting from America
articles.content:
The Duke of Sussex has won a bid to bring a High Court challenge against the Home Office over his UK security arrangements. 
Prince Harry is taking legal action over a decision not to allow him to p… [+1903 chars]

articles.author: Tom Schad and Lindsay Schnell, USA TODAY
articles.title: Noah Lyles bests Michael Johnson's record to repeat as 200 world champ - USA TODAY
articles.description: Noah Lyles won his second consecutive world title at 200 meters, breaking the American record in one of the week's most highly anticipated events.
articles.content:
Noah Lyles still owns the men's 200-meter dash.
Lyles broke Michael Johnson's national record Thursday night to repeat as world champion – and lead the second U.S. sprint sweep in six days at Haywar… [+5045 chars]

articles.title: U.S. Supreme Court declines to allow Biden's shift on immigration enforcement - Reuters.com
articles.description: The U.S. Supreme Court on Thursday declined to reinstate President Joe Biden's policy shifting the focus of America's immigration enforcement toward public safety threats, handing a victory to Texas and Louisiana as they challenge a plan they call unlawful.
articles.content: WASHINGTON, July 21 (Reuters) - The U.S. Supreme Court on Thursday declined to reinstate President Joe Biden's policy shifting the focus of America's immigration enforcement toward public safety thre… [+2006 chars]

articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: American and United airlines return to profitability - CNN
articles.description: American and United airlines both reported their first operating profit since the start of the pandemic, as strong demand for air travel and high fares allowed the carriers to overcome rising fuel prices.
